body:
Since TileSizePossibilityFrontierCheck is nonrestrictive (meaning, the meaning of the sentence is the same if you leave it out), it should be set off with commas.

But probably a better way to write it would just be to say:

> TileSizePossibilityFrontierCheck defines the frontier ...
body_html:
Since TileSizePossibilityFrontierCheck is nonrestrictive (meaning, the meaning of the sentence is the same if you leave it out), it should be set off with commas.

But probably a better way to write it would just be to say:

TileSizePossibilityFrontierCheck defines the frontier ...
